channel.title: Need help running 508 serv
channel.description:
Well, heres the thing. Running 508s wasn't a huge deal at all a long time ago. I could run and it would be fine. Now when i run it says
The system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue....
I'm not sure if its my java or what but if you need the info in the runserver box its
@echo off cd ../bin color 0a Title DavidScape 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe" DavidScape/Server 43594 pause
TYsm and i hope you can help

item.title: Need help running 508 serv
item.dc:creator: @weezyfbaby weezyfbaby
item.description:
@weezyfbaby wrote:

No he means where it says says \jdk1.6.0_11…

change it to your verson of java, usually you change the 11 to…06,07,08,09,10,11,12,13,14,15,16 depending on which version you have, 16 being the latest version

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running 508 serv
item.dc:creator: @G_D_s G D s
item.description:
@G_D_s wrote:

[quote=“barragepker, post:1, topic:300253”]Well, heres the thing. Running 508s wasn’t a huge deal at all a long time ago. I could run and it would be fine. Now when i run it says

The system cannot find the path specified
press any key to continue…

I’m not sure if its my java or what but if you need the info in the runserver box its

@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title DavidScape 508
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” DavidScape/Server 43594
pause

TYsm and i hope you can help[/quote]

Change the JDK Version to your JDK

Read full topic
